Text: why cant movies be uploaded in its original language? are you too stupid to read? moron.

I could explain the instrinsic value of the non-original language versions of chinese martial arts classics. And perhaps even get into a debate about german-made "swedish erotica" during the 70's. And other fields where linguistics meets the arts.
But I won't. Because it is plain to see you are not a fan of the arts.

@pplot: I'm very thankful for your upload, the only problem I have is the language. Don't take it as an offense, please, but I enjoy these kind of movies with the original language. Is there any way you could find / upload it?
